attributes.action: Put pensions back to 65 for those over 40 at present time as a vote winner in next general election
attributes.additional_details:
We are all fed up of being asked to work till 66+ , the party that restores the retirement age to 65  for anyone over 40 at present time, all below that go to new rules.
You will get our vote next general election. This will be your guarantee of a win.
